attributes.additional_details:
There is too much controversy about God Save the Queen being the "English" Anthem hence Scots and Welsh not singing at the Olympics.

It should be changed to be a more inclusive UK anthem by adding the old proposed verse:

One realm of races four
Blest more and ever more
God save our land!
Home of the brave and free
Set in the silver sea
True nurse of chivalry
God save our land!

England and NI MUST then use different anthems at their respective sporting events.
